DESCRIPTION.P: [L,U]= lu(A) produces two matrices and such that A = L* with upper triangular and E* lower triangular for a permutation matrix .
If has rank k, rows k+ to n of are zero.
[L,U,E]= lu(A) produces three matrices , and such that E*A = L* with upper triangular and E* lower triangular for a permutation matrix .
If is a real matrix, using the function lufact and luget it is possible to obtain the permutation matrices and also when is not full rank the column compression of the matrix .

USED_FUNCTIONS.P: lu decompositions are based on the Lapack routines DGETRF for real matrices and ZGETRF for the complex case.
